snippet: Ron Paul called Rick Santorum "a big government person" and accused him of becoming a high-paid lobbyist after leaving the Senate.
abstract: Ron Paul called Rick Santorum "a big government person" and accused him of becoming a high-paid lobbyist after leaving the Senate.
lead_paragraph: Rick Santorum -- moving up in the polls -- found himself in the crosshairs tonight.

headline.main: Santorum in the Crosshairs in First Debate as Major Contender
